description: Allows the user full control over all users
notes: This permission allows administrators access to make organizational changes.

description: Allows the user full control over internal users
notes: Allows the user to change; activate or deactivate any internal user.

issue: can modify profiles and permission sets
description: User can modify profiles and permission sets
notes: Allows the user to create; edit and delete profiles and Permission Sets.

description: This allows a user to assign Permission Sets
notes: Allows the user to assign a permission set to a user; thereby granting everything included in that permission set to that user.

description: This allows a user to manage custom permissions
notes: Allows the user to change the contents of a custom permission set; which could grant users additional permissions.

description: This allows a user to manage roles
notes: Assign your users a role and specific permissions from the users screen in Marketing Cloud.

issue: can manage IP Addresses within the environment
description: This allows a user to manage IP addresses
notes: You can specify a list of IP addresses from which users can log in without receiving a login challenge. However; this step doesn't restrict access entirely for users outside the Trusted IP Range.

issue: can bypass MFA for UI Logins
description: MFA bypass is bad
notes: To enforce MFA in Salesforce for users who log in through an SSO Auth Provider; configure the assigned user profile to require a High Assurance session security level at login; and make sure that Multi-Factor Authentication is in the High Assurance Column.

issue: can modify all data in the environment
description: Modify all data is bad
notes: Allows the user to edit any field on any object. This includes 'Read-Only' fields; or fields on records that belong to any user even if not shared.

description: User can modify password policies
notes: You can set password history and length and complexity requirements. You can also specify what to do when a user forgets the password.

description: User can reset other user passwords
notes: As an admin you can reset a users password for better protection or if they're locked out

description: User can purchase additional licenses and features
notes: The order record defines important fields about when and how Salesforce Billing invoices your order products.

description: User can manage Auth Providers which doesnt sound cool
notes: With authentication providers your users can log in to your Salesforce org or Experience Cloud site with single sign-on (SSO) using credentials from a third party.

issue: can manage the Salesforce Mobile settings
description: Allows a user to edit Mobile settings
notes: TBC

description: Allows a user to modify sharing configurations
notes: manage your organization-wide sharing defaults; sharing rules and other sharing settings.

description: Check that this is intended
notes: can view all exported data and all custom objects and fields in the Export Service page. This permission is granted by default only to the System Administrator profile because it enables wide visibility.

description: Allows a user to specify the login access policies that apply to Admins
notes: Control whether your users are prompted to grant account access to Salesforce admins; and whether users can grant access to publishers.

description: Allows a user to configure library content
notes: Library permissions provide the different levels of library access that are required for most organizations.

issue: can create and edit Apex classes
description: Allows a user to create and edit Apex classes and Triggers
notes: Users must have the 'Author Apex' permission to execute Apex code using the executeAnonymous() API call or any other SOAP API call exposed in the Apex WSDL.

issue: can view the Setup and Configuration
description: User can view Setup and Configuration
notes: Allows the user into the Setup area.

description: Check that this is intended
notes: It determines the tasks that a member can perform in a particular library. The same user can have a different library permission in each library.

description: Allows a user to view all users
notes: Grants Read access to all users, so that you can see their user record details

description: Allows a user to view all data
notes: Allows the user to see all data in all fields even fields that have been removed from page layouts 'Read-Only' fields or records that are not shared with them

description: MAY allow user to fix risks
notes: As an admin, you can use Health Check to identify and fix potential vulnerabilities in your security settings all from a single page.

issue: can customize the tenancy? I don't know what this means
description: Someone please investigate this for me
notes: Customize Application' is a powerful administrative permission. Administrators should be aware of the capabilities granted to users who are given the 'Customize Application' permission, as outlined below.

description: User can export reports
notes: To work with report data in a dedicated tool; such as a spreadsheet; export report data as a Microsoft Excel (.xlsx or .xls) file or comma-separated values (.csv) file.

description: This currently only checks if the default password length (8) is set. It should be raised for any length less than 14
notes: NOTE: Please don't raise this issue if Single Sign-On is exclusively used and no local Salesforce accounts exist

description: 3 Login Attempts is sufficient as any more can prove fatal to password spray attacks
notes: This is contextual pending individual risk appetite - personally I don't like more than 3
the length of time after which the system logs out inactive users.
